external_database.name: KEGG: Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes
external_database.description: The Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes(KEGG) database is a resource for understanding high-level functions and utilities of the biological system.  KEGG PATHWAY is a collection of manually drawn pathway maps representing molecular interactions, reactions and relationships.  Gene-pathway membership and KEGG Disease associations were retrieved for all curated human pathways using the KEGG REST API.
